field.filter: SELECT IPv6Block AS b WHERE IF (:this->parent_org_id = 0, b.org_id = :this->org_id, b.org_id = :this->parent_org_id)
SELECT IPv6Block AS b WHERE b.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv6Subnet AS s WHERE s.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv6Subnet AS s WHERE s.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv6Range AS r WHERE r.subnet_id = :this->subnet_id AND r.org_id = :this->org_id
